origin-game-friendsplaying-text.friendsplayingdescription: {0} No friends playing.| {1} A friend is playing right now.| ]0,+Inf] %friends% friends are playing right now.
origin-game-friendsplaying-text.friendsplayeddescription: {0} No friends have been playing.| {1} A friend has been playing.| ]0,+Inf] %friends% of your friends have been playing.

origin-home-discovery-tile-recfriends.description: Recommended because you have mutual friends.
origin-home-discovery-tile-recfriends.norecdescription: We do not have anymore suggested friends right now. You can always add friends from your friends list.

origin-home-newuser-tile.title: Welcome to your Origin Home
origin-home-newuser-tile.subtitle: From here you can launch games you've been playing, see what everyone is playing, discover new content and connect with friends

origin-home-page-offline.title: You're Off the Grid.
origin-home-page-offline.description: Go online to see what your friends are playing, and learn about new content to keep your games fresh.

origin-panelmessage-nooffline.title: Error
origin-panelmessage-nooffline.description: Failed to load required files. Please restart.

origin-panelmessage-notfound.title: Not Found
origin-panelmessage-notfound.description: I don't know where you are trying to go, but this page does not exist.

origin-game-library-anonymous.title: Games Library Unavailable
origin-game-library-anonymous.description: Please login to view your games.

origin-game-library.description: Please log in to view your games.

origin-home-discovery-tile-mostpopularga.description: The most popular game on Origin this week.

origin-home-recommended-action-trial.title: %game% - It's Game Time!
origin-home-recommended-action-trial.subtitle: Continue your trial!
origin-home-recommended-action-trial.description: {0} Your trial has expired. | {1} You have an hour left. | ]1,+Inf] You have %hours% hours left in your trial.
origin-home-recommended-action-trial.descriptionexpired: Keep playing and earn more achivements. Purchase %game% now to continue playing.

origin-home-discovery-tile-ogneverplayed.description: You have not played this yet. Give it a try.

origin-home-discovery-tile-ogrecentlyrel.preloaddescription: Pre-load now and play it the second it is released on %date%
origin-home-discovery-tile-ogrecentlyrel.releaseddescription: Newly released and in your library.

origin-home-recommended-action-ito.title: %game% Disc Installation
origin-home-recommended-action-ito.description: %game% is installing and will be ready to play soon.

origin-home-recommended-action-preload.subtitle: Preload Now!
origin-home-recommended-action-preload.description: %game% is available for preload. Prepare to play the minute of release!

origin-home-footer.title: Looking for more?
origin-home-footer.description: The more you play games and the more you add friends, the better your recommendations will become.
